edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class Survey

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Survey

  • public class Survey
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a survey object and contains information about a specific survey.

      StudySpace ss)
       throws org.w3c.dom.DOMException
        Constructor - setup a survey by parsing the file
        Parameters:
        xmlDoc - Survey Xml that contains all the questions.
        ss - Study space to which this survey belongs to.
        Throws:
        org.w3c.dom.DOMException

      • printProgress

        public java.lang.String printProgress(Page currentPage,
                             java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> completedPages)
        Displays the sub-menu on the left side of frame to show the survey progress - the sub-menu won't let the user go back to review completed pages.
        Parameters:
        currentPage - Current page the user is on in the survey.
        completedPages - Hashtable of the completed pages in the survey.
        Returns:
        String HTML format of the survey progress on left side of the survey page.

      • printProgress

        public java.lang.String printProgress(Page currentPage)
        Displays the sub-menu on the left side of frame to show the survey progress - the sub-menu will have the links to let the user review the completed pages
        Parameters:
        currentPage - Current page the user is on in the survey.
        Returns:
        String HTML format of the survey progress on left side of the survey page.

        public int getPageIndex(java.lang.String id)

      • getPage

        public Page getPage(java.lang.String id)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isLastPage

        public boolean isLastPage(int idx)
        Checks if the index given is same as the index of the last page in the array of page of this survey.
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the page to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean True of the page is last else false.

      • isLastPage

        public boolean isLastPage(java.lang.String id)
        Searches by page ID and checks if the page is the last page in the page array
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the page to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean True of the page is last else false.

      • nextPage

        public Page nextPage(java.lang.String id)
        Searches by page ID, get the next page from the page array
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the page whose next page is needed.
        Returns:
        Page Next page in the survey, null in case of last page or error.

      • getFieldList

        public java.lang.String[] getFieldList()
        This function returns all Field Names in survey -- used by DataBank to setup database.
        Returns:
        Array Array of all the field names in the survey.

      • getValueTypeList

        public char[] getValueTypeList()
        This function returns all value types of fields in survey -- used by DataBank to setup database.
        Returns:
        Array Array of all the value types of the fields in the survey.
